nodes.text: By the time of the Cold War, a darksider guardian entity was responsible for protecting the ancient Jedi Master Rajivari's sanctuary, named the Fount of Rajivari, on Tython. He would only allow purified individuals to enter the Fount and during the time of the conflict, a powerful Jedi Padawan attempted to enter the sanctuary however, the Jedi refused to be purified and was instead attacked by the Guardian, both physically and mentally. Despite this, the Padawan would reach the Fount of Rajivari alive and with his mind intact.
He was capable of pyrokinesis as demonstrated when he ignited the future Barsen'thor. He was also capable of causing Force illusions.
